<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Thorough Search](/Feats.aspx?ID=2154) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 209 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
expert in Perception

</column>

---

You take your time searching to ensure you find everything. When [Searching](/Actions.aspx?ID=519), you can take twice as long to search. Normally this means you Search at up to one quarter of your Speed, to a maximum of 150 feet per minute to check everything, or 75 feet per minute to check everything before you walk into it. If you do, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Perception checks to [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84).
name: Thorough Search
